document_data.name: Baga Choki
document_data.mainbody: '''Baga Choki''' was a [[Tuigan]] warrior and member of the [[Grand Army of the Tuigan]] during the mid 14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Description: Baga was tall for a Tuigan and possessed a sinister countenance. Keen intelligence was reflected from his hard gaze.
document_data.Activities:
Baga was the commander of a ''tumen''â€”a Tuigan military unit of 10,000 soldiers. He served within the portion of the army under Prince [[Hubadai Khahan]]'s ultimate command.

He was actively involved in the conquest of [[Semphar]].
document_data.Possessions: He owned a magical [[two-handed sword]], magical [[lamellar]] armor, and a ''[[amulet of sound thought]]''.
